fields.name: name
fields.label: Section Name
fields.description: The label shown for this section in the Content Tree

fields.name: filters
fields.label: Filter Tags
fields.description: Comma-separated filter values (e.g. SUV, Sedan)

fields.name: contentFragmentVariation
fields.label: Selected Variation
fields.description: Persisted variation for publish; leave empty for master.

fields.name: rotate
fields.label: Rotate
fields.description: Select the rotation which will rotate the image.

fields.name: flip
fields.label: Flip
fields.description: Select the flip for the image either vertical or horizontal or vertical & horizontal

fields.name: crop
fields.label: Crop
fields.description: Crop the final image using four values: left, top, width, and height, all in percentages. For example, 10p,10p,50p,50p means crop the image starting 10% from the left and top, and take 50% of the image's width and height

fields.name: videoTitle
fields.label: Video Title / Alt Text
fields.description: Accessible title for the video

fields.name: autoplay
fields.label: Autoplay
fields.description: Automatically start playing the video when loaded (will be muted for browser compatibility)

fields.name: loop
fields.label: Loop
fields.description: Loop the video continuously

fields.name: muted
fields.label: Muted
fields.description: Start the video muted

fields.name: delivery_Type
fields.label: Delivery Type
fields.description: 'Dynamic Media' will be rendered by providing dynamic media server URL. 'Dynamic Media with OpenAPI' will use openAPI delivery with additional options to manipulate the image rendering on the fly.

fields.name: image
fields.label: Image
fields.description: Select AEM DAM repository from asset selector if using Delivery Type as Dynamic Media. Select DM delivery repository from asset selector if using Delivery Type as Dynamic Media with OpenAPI

fields.name: rotation
fields.label: Rotation
fields.description: Select the rotation which will rotate the image.

fields.name: flip
fields.label: Flip
fields.description: Select the flip for the image either vertical or horizontal or vertical & horizontal

fields.name: crop
fields.label: Crop
fields.description: Crop the final image using four values: left, top, width, and height, all in percentages. For example, 10p,10p,50p,50p means crop the image starting 10% from the left and top, and take 50% of the image's width and height

fields.name: config_source
fields.label: Template Config Source
fields.description: Choose the source to provide the template path and variable configurations.

fields.name: dm_template_url
fields.label: Template Path
fields.description: Provide full URL for the Dynamic Media Template. Template should have 3 image, width, title and description

fields.name: var_mapping
fields.label: Variable Mappings
fields.description: Provide variable values in 'variablename=value' format where variablename is the variable name and value is the variable value. These values should be exposed in the DM template inorder to get replaced e.g. $leftImage=DynamicMediaNA/adobestock-167833331

fields.name: subtitle
fields.label: Subtitle
fields.value: Search for healthcare providers in your area

fields.name: damJsonPath
fields.label: JSON File Path
fields.description: Select JSON file from DAM

fields.name: contentFragmentFolder
fields.label: Content Fragment Folder
fields.description: Select folder containing multiple doctor Content Fragments

fields.name: contentFragmentFolder
fields.label: Content Fragment Folder
fields.description: Select folder containing multiple doctor Content Fragments

fields.name: apiUrl
fields.label: API URL
fields.description: External API endpoint for doctor data

fields.name: staticJsonPath
fields.label: Static JSON Path
fields.description: Path to static JSON file

fields.name: basic
fields.label: Use the Edit Form Properties extension to configure Adaptive Form properties, including Submit Action, Prefill, and Thank-You options.
fields.description: Visit https://www.adobe.com/go/learn_aemforms_cs_properties_ext for more details.
